functions.name: Get Owners for Collection
functions.description: Retrieves the owners of all NFTs for a given collection. The value of each owner is their total tokens balance.

args.name: Contract Address
args.description: The address of the NFT contract.

args.name: Network
args.description: The name or the ID of the blockchain network. Available networks: eth-mainnet, eth-goerli, polygon-mainnet, polygon-mumbai, arb-mainnet, arb-goerli, opt-mainnet, opt-goerli

functions.name: Get Owners of NFTs matching TokenIds.
functions.description: Retrieves the owners of all NFT tokenIds for a given collection.

args.name: Contract Address
args.description: The address of the NFT contract.

args.name: Network
args.description: The name or the ID of the blockchain network. Available networks: eth-mainnet, eth-goerli, polygon-mainnet, polygon-mumbai, arb-mainnet, arb-goerli, opt-mainnet, opt-goerli

functions.name: Get Owners of NFTs Matching Trait
functions.description: Fetches the owners of all NFTs with a matching trait for the given contract and trait.

args.name: Contract Address
args.description: The address of the NFT contract.

args.name: Network
args.description: The name or the ID of the blockchain network. Available networks: eth-mainnet, eth-goerli, polygon-mainnet, polygon-mumbai, arb-mainnet, arb-goerli, opt-mainnet, opt-goerli

args.name: Trait Type
args.description: The type of the trait to search for.

args.name: Trait Value
args.description: The value of the trait to search for.
